FAQs.Title:
Need help?
Check out our FAQs

List.Question1: How long does a typical job take?
List.Answer1: Most drywall jobs are completed within 1 to 3 days, depending on the size and complexity of the repair or installation.
List.Question2: What if I need help with a leak or restoration?
List.Answer2: We handle water-damaged drywall, including tear-out, drying guidance, and full restoration from patching to painting.
List.Question3: Do you repair cracks from settling?
List.Answer3: Yes, we repair all types of cracks, including those caused by house settling, and ensure a smooth, long-lasting finish.
List.Question4: What payment methods do you accept?
List.Answer4: We accept most major payment methods including credit cards, e-transfers, and checks. Payment is typically due upon completion.
List.Question5: Do you work on homes with popcorn ceilings?
List.Answer5: Yes, we remove popcorn ceilings and repair any underlying damage, leaving a modern, smooth or textured finish.
